TopicTitle: how do you make a base capable of reaching the Mun, or other planets?

Articles.Content: i have a tanker built, but where should i place the engines for getting it into space?

I have little experience in base building, but you should always design a lifter rocket to put the parts of the base into orbit and finally touching down. ALWAYS break up the base into small pieces, as they are much easier to maneuver and manage the way you need them to.

I'm in the process of building this one:

I built a few different modules and docked them together on the surface. Generally manoeuvring smaller payloads is easier. It takes more time but it is a little easier to do if you can design craft quite well.

You can click on the image if you want to see my youtube series on it.
